text: Martin John Dunn (March 9, 1956 - September 11, 2020) was an American lawyer and politician. He was born in Holyoke, Massachusetts. He was the Mayor of Holyoke, Massachusetts from 1987 to 1991. He was a member of the Massachusetts Senate from 1991 to 1993. He was a member of the Democratic Party. Dunn died on September 11, 2020 in Holyoke at the age of 64. ==References== Category:1956 births Category:2020 deaths Category:American mayors Category:Members of the Massachusetts General Court Category:Politicians from Massachusetts Category:Democratic Party (United States) politicians Category:People from Holyoke, Massachusetts
title: Martin J. Dunn
